intro: Step into a cozy world of hidden object fun, heartwarming stories, and the joy of creating your perfect home.
description:
Buy your own dream home — Choose the house that fits your heart and finally make that dream come true.
Get your own car — Add style and freedom to your new lifestyle!
Decorate four beautiful rooms — Personalize your kitchen, living room, bedroom, and garden with hundreds of charming furniture and decor pieces.

Explore warm and inviting locations: front porches, green backyards, homey interiors, and peaceful nature spots. Each scene is filled with dozens of well-hidden items waiting to be found.

Mini-Games and Relaxing Puzzles
Take a break and enjoy thoughtful, relaxing mini-games that sharpen your focus and unlock new locations and features.

Collector’s Edition Includes:
- 8 all-new hidden object scenes
- 8 relaxing mini-games
- 8 bonus levels from previous Sweet Home games
